title: What’s on Google TV: Pluto TV adding seven new channels, No Way Home gets digital release date
content:
Google TV users are about to get some more free channels, as Pluto TV is preparing to add several new channels to its lineup.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Pluto TV adding seven new channels, No Way Home gets digital release date appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Pluto TV has confirmed that it will add seven new channels to its free content lineup over the course of March 2022.
